DOC.brief_summary: To determine the functional effects of Citicoline, a natural supplement, when administered for a duration of four weeks (28 days) to non-psychiatric adolescent male participants. The investigators hypothesize that citicoline will provide cognitive benefits to this population after 28 days of supplementation.
DOC.brief_title: Cognizin Citicoline Dosing in a Healthy Adolescent Male Population
DOC.criteria: Male Age 1318 years old No history of comorbid psychiatric disorder, current Axis I or II diagnosis or previous pharmacotherapeutic trial Head injury with LOC > 5 minutes Use of any psychotropic medication
